Topic.Title: Audio and unscramble do not work on mobile phone

Posts.EditableText:
I uploaded a gamebook as unlisted, and I tried it out on my iPhone. It looks very nice and all the hyperlinks work. However, audio files don't play, and the unscramble feature I added as a function call when the player enters the correct word in response to a Get input, does not work.

Everything works fine on my laptop, but not on my phone. Any advice?

Thanks,

T.

Posts.EditableText: I got around being unable to play multiple sounds by using some html5 code and I discovered some stuff during my investigation. Unfortunately no mobile browsers support autoplay of media (because people may get charged a ridiculous sum for doing so via their phone contract). I'm not sure if this is the same issue but it's unfair to point the finger at Quest when mobile browsers are specifically coded not to autoplay media.
